meta.title: Teaching the Whole Child - Salt Lake City Open Classroom

link.title: Teaching the Whole Child - Salt Lake City Open Classroom

meta.content: Teaching the Whole Child - Salt Lake City Open Classroom

The Open Classroom is a K-8 free public charter school where children learn to be capable leaders, problem-solvers, and friends.
In addition to academic needs, the Open Classroom considers the social, emotional, creative, cognitive, and physical needs of every child.
Apply Now
COVID-19 UPDATES AND RESOURCES
Sign-up for 2020-21 CommitteesRead more ›

p.span: The Open Classroom is a K-8 free public charter school where children learn to be capable leaders, problem-solvers, and friends.
In addition to academic needs, the Open Classroom considers the social, emotional, creative, cognitive, and physical needs of every child.

img.alt: Learn more about the Open Classroom

p.span: ALL SCHOOL TOURS HAVE BEEN TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED AT THE DIRECTIVE OF THE SALT LAKE CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT. WE WILL RESUME TOURS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

img.p:
Tours begin at 9am in the library on the upper level of the Lowell building at 134 D Street.
Please RSVP prior to 8:00 PM the day before your preferred tour date. Doing so will ensure that we have a parent available to conduct the tour and answer all your questions.
RSVP HERE to secure your spot
img.li: Thursday, May 14 - May be cancelled due to school wide testing
Thursday, May 28 - May be cancelled due to school wide testing

img.alt: Learn more about the Open Classroom
img.p: Parent Information Nights for prospective families will be held:
Attendance satisfies the application requirement and is a great opportunity to meet and ask questions of families who attend the OC.

p.span:
The placement lottery for the 2019-2020 school year is complete. Applications are still being accepted, and new applicants will be placed on the waitlist in the order received.
If you participated in this year's lottery but have not heard back, please contact Nicole Laird at (801)578-8144 to find your child's position on the waitlist

img.alt: Learn more about the Open Classroom
img.p: The Open Classroom Charter School is a parent cooperative learning community in which teachers and parents collaborate to educate the whole child and empower life-long learners. Our founders named the program the Open Classroom because they wanted the program to stand for a flexible approach to education, where the needs of each child are considered individually.

				<#
				var w = ! data.model.width || data.model.width > 640 ? 640 : data.model.width,
					h = ! data.model.height ? 360 : data.model.height;

				if ( data.model.width && w !== data.model.width ) {
					h = Math.ceil( ( h * w ) / data.model.width );
				}
				#>

				<#  var w_rule = '', classes = [],
		w, h, settings = wp.media.view.settings,
		isYouTube = isVimeo = false;

	if ( ! _.isEmpty( data.model.src ) ) {
		isYouTube = data.model.src.match(/youtube|youtu\.be/);
		isVimeo = -1 !== data.model.src.indexOf('vimeo');
	}

	if ( settings.contentWidth && data.model.width >= settings.contentWidth ) {
		w = settings.contentWidth;
	} else {
		w = data.model.width;
	}

	if ( w !== data.model.width ) {
		h = Math.ceil( ( data.model.height * w ) / data.model.width );
	} else {
		h = data.model.height;
	}

	if ( w ) {
		w_rule = 'width: ' + w + 'px; ';
	}

	if ( isYouTube ) {
		classes.push( 'youtube-video' );
	}

	if ( isVimeo ) {
		classes.push( 'vimeo-video' );
	}

#>


<video controls
	class="wp-video-shortcode {{ classes.join( ' ' ) }}"
